author: Graham Rapier
title: Allstate is giving $600 million back to customers because there are fewer car crashes during the coronavirus pandemic (ALL)
description: Insurance giants are saving hundreds of millions of dollars thanks to the drop in filed claims as Americans stop driving. Allstate said it would return $600 million, or about 15% of premiums, to customers this month. Across the world, a drop in driving has me…
content:
Allstate is returning hundreds of millions from auto insurance premiums as the number of claims filed falls dramatically thanks to a similar decrease in driving.
The No. 4 American insurer said Monday that most customers will get 15% of their monthly premium… [+1134 chars]
